properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prabhuni sangamaa melko nede nidra nundi melko{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nee satruvai naghatasarpam neepai thana padaga neththi Nee painabadi kaatuveyun ponchiyunna dinamulalo{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Abaddha pravaktha lilalo prabaluchunna dinamulalo Kristu virodi keelu bommavai baanisabratuku neekela{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Banduvulu bhavanalenunna dhana sampannata yentunna Ihamunu vadali vellunappudu yemiyuraadu nee venta{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
v5
v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Priyudesunito veyyi yendlu palimpa siddapadumaa Paramuna nityam paripalinche a bagyamunu aashinchi{/lang-eng}
